200703.n: Foundations of IT Service Management with ITIL

200803.n: Foundations of IT Service Management with ITIL

catList: Information Technology Infrastructure Library (ITIL) is a set of concepts and best practices that IT professionals use as a guideline in the delivery and support of business-focused IT services. This course provides a detailed insight into ITIL by covering various aspects of IT service management, such as incident management, configuration management, service desk management, and release management. Participants also participate in a simulation game that covers these topics in a realistic problem setting to enhance understanding of real-life implications.
